Text: 2 seconds to Supernova...
1 second to Supernova...
50 seconds to Supernova...
40 seconds to Supernova...
30 seconds to Supernova...
Reactor capacity exceeded. Gravitational collapse imminent.
Defeat the Warriors of Darkness
Alisaie's Aether
We've come too far, sacrificed too much to stop now!
You think you are the only ones to have known sorrow!?
No, NO! We will not be denied so easily!
You heard the man! Leave the fighting to us!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! The ranger! You must stop her!
The fate of two worlds hangeth in the balance, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Quickly, thine aether!
No more games!
Godsdammit, I can't break free!
Trying to beat us at our own game? Hah!
I must have more aether!
Go to her, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! We will deal with the others!
I've...I've given her all I can. The rest is up to you!
Caution, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! You mustn't channel so much at once!
Now, Blanhaerz! Kill <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If> while <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If>'s weak!
Is this...the power of the Echo!?
Again they rise! Have these warriors no limits!?
We'll hold the line, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, but you must...you must...
Unto her blade we render our aether, that fortune may favor us this day...
Hurry, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Give me your aether!
This has gone on long enough! J'rhoomale─kill the girl!
Hurry it up, Naillebert!
'Tis done! With this blade I banish the darkness!
No... Not like this...
Now, Naillebert! Burn them all!
No...no matter the cost...
Forgive me, Alisaie. I tried...
This...cannot be...
Oh, Moenbryda... My dearest...
That's it, that's it! We've got them!
Magus of Darkness's Aether
Channel aether into Alisaie's blade
Arrive at the Cranial Plate
Open the main hatch
Enter Alexander

Materials acquired...
Initiating repair protocol!
Reassembling right arm...
Reassembling left arm...
Reassembling main hull...
Preparing reusable materials...
Superior materials detected... Switching to high priority mode!
Biggs! Wedge! Bring the Excelsior around! You're on your own from here, ObjectParameter(1), ,1)>. Good luck and godsspeed!
Materials recovered... Terminating priority mode...
Disassembly and absorption complete... Energy fully charged!
Right arm reassembly
Left arm reassembly
Main hull reassembly
Arrive at the Slickred Drainage Ducts
Open the exhaust ducts
Enter Danglylimbs
Pssshkoh... Lamebrix is not hating uplanders, but Quickthinx pays much jinglyshine! Lamebrix kills uplanders dead!
Pssshkoh... Lamebrix will flatten uplanders like crawlybug!
Pssshkoh... Lamebrix is clearseeing! Moving uplander is dying uplander!
Pssshkoh... Illuminati give Lamebrix toys. Lamebrix likes funplaying with toys!
Pssshkoh... Lamebrix does not...\\<cough>...get enough jinglyshine for...\\<cough>...this...
Clear the Power Supply Line
Designation: Blassty. Intruders to central calculation system detected. Initiating extermination protocol!
Activating transformation module. Transition to rapid-fire mode. Combat zone and all intruders will be eradicated!
Designation: Blassty. All systems...down. Repeat, all...systems...
Press the button to descend!
Eject
Northeastern multifield
Southern multifield
Northwestern multifield
I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.
The time of judgment is nigh...
Executing judgment protocol in 10 seconds...
5 seconds to divine judgment...
4 seconds...
You, who would inherit the future... You have proven yourself...worthy.
My faithful... To the past with you, to free these ones from the prison of time...
Temporal reconfiguration aborted... Insufficient data... Insufficient data...!
Temporal reconfiguration successful. Alteration of history by malicious entities is not authorized!
Space-time navigation systems activated... Initiating search-and-destroy protocol for all malicious entities!
Commencing space-time interference... O fortress that is mine own body, heed my call!
Ignorant and unworthy are not welcome in Illuminati future! Here, uplanders meet their endtimes!
What!? Freezetime field is deactivated!? Pshhhkohhh...no matter! Uplanders will be reduced to smolderdust! FIRE!
Temporal reconfiguration
Judgment has been rendered... The verdict of history is...
Arrive in the Hall of Magicks
Clear the Hall of Magicks
Arrive in the Astrology and Astromancy Camera
Clear the Astrology and Astromancy Camera
Arrive in the Rare Tomes Room
You are unwelcome here. This you know...yet your thirst for knowledge brings you nonetheless. I would be happy to oblige!
Yes, I believe this is the perfect volume for you...
What's this one? “Theories on the Existence of River Imps”...? That's piqued my interest!
Behold this collection of grimoires of legend! Feel their power and puissance, and let it fill you with rapturous pleasure...then DIE!
Your thirst for knowledge is still not sated? Then take this tome! And this one! Take ALL of them!
Grrroooaaarrrgh!
10 seconds until Meteor impact...
5 seconds until Meteor impact...
4 seconds until Meteor impact...
3 seconds until Meteor impact...
2 seconds until Meteor impact...
1 second until Meteor impact...
This conflict was foreordained, you know. All is laid out upon the Wheel of Fate, free from the meddling hands of mortals.
Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you! Darkness to me!
Bring death to blood and flesh, destroy demented demons all!
Ah...yesss... So this is the Dark! I am becoming one with you now... It is... It is ecstasy! Yes! The Dark has chosen me! The bodies of the unwitting will be my vessels! I am immortal...
Clear all barricades
Defeat the magitek predator
Slay all the imperial defenders
Defeat the armored weapon
Clear the parapet
Motion tracking activated...

I'll give you a glorious end, Warrior of Light!
Come! See what awaits you at the far edge of fate!
Never...the easy road...for me...
Imperial identification keys
Defeat Deathgaze Hollow
Arrive at the Rostrum
Defeat Ferdiad Hollow
Arrive in the Queen's Graces
Defeat Proto Ultima
Defeat Scathach
Defeat Diabolos
The Shadow Queen's aether

There it is up ahead─the island from the tome!
Let's find somewhere to dock this behemoth!

These buildings were meant to house the refugees of Mhach.
A promised land, forgotten by time...

...The voidsent have claimed this place, just as I suspected.
It is become a nest of shadows and despair.

The Queen's Coffin, rent in twain!
Scathach is already awoken, then...

By the twitching of my whiskers, there is fell magick ahead.
Only the queen herself could radiate malice of this magnitude!

Insolent mortals...
One does not come uninvited to the Shadow Queen's castle!

Forgive me, my queen...
This wretched wraith has failed you...

Oh, how I love entertaining unexpected guests!
And do I spy some familiar faces in the crowd!?

Alas, we come to the end of my show...
There shall be...no encore...

Welcome, mortals, to my citadel of shadows.
Have you come to deepen the gloom with an offering of souls?

Such pervasive light...
It doth steal into the darkest corners, and chase away my shadows...

You expect the creature I was before, enfeebled by confinement?
Hah! Face me now in the fullness of my power!

Shall I thrust open the gate to the void?
The night hounds slaver at the scent of your fear...
Another rift... Another chance to test your might?
Not even in eternal sleep shall you be free from the terror of my weaving!

The energies of the nether will be mine!
I will bathe in primordial darkness!
Bow before the shrieking majesty of the void!

What have you done!?
You seek to wrest from me control of the portal?

So be it. A contest of strength, then!
A contest you have no hope of winning.

Impossible! I am a lord of the void, you cannot─
Aaarrrggghhh!
\\<pant> \\<pant> Mine imprisonment...weakened me more than I imagined...

But you have not bested me yet!
Witness now my true purpose for seeking the queen's rebirth!

Yes. The glory! An infinite well of shadow!
You have breached Scathach's unholy vessel, and released her power unto me!
From the depths of shadow's well shall rise your ruination!

Must I entreat the very specter of death to be rid of you!?
I care not! I will wager all for your destruction!

What more must I have...?
How great the flood of darkness...to drown out your light...
Creeping shade and silhouette, gather unto me!

To me, my protégé!
Smother these intruders with the arts that I have taught thee!

And still you refuse to dim and submit...
Must I try a different tact?
Your fate was sealed the moment you set foot in my domain!
From a chrysalis of light shall I birth the deepest shadow...
Accept my touch, and bask in tenebrous brilliance!
Defeat Diabolos Hollow
Ultima systems...online. Performing systems check...
Systems check complete. Initializing armageddon sequence...
Aetheromagnetic induction beacon active. Commencing aether transfer.
Reactor cells charged. Supernova ready.
Reactor cells hypercharging...
50 seconds to Supernova...
40 seconds to Supernova...
30 seconds to Supernova...
20 seconds to Supernova...
10 seconds to Supernova...
5 seconds to Supernova...
4 seconds to Supernova...
3 seconds to Supernova...
2 seconds to Supernova...
1 second to Supernova...
Reactor capacity exceeded. Gravitational collapse imminent.
You will not disturb Her Majesty!
Beloved queen... I was not fit to cower in your shadow...

Reaping winds, heed my command!
Strip the souls from their worthless shells!

I see the blossoms of your fragile lives...
I need but reach forth and pluck them from their stems!
Come closer, come closer! I promise I will give you a show to die for!
Diabolos's aether
This tiresome battle hath dragged on overlong. Enough.
What's this? Visitors to our fair abode? Pray allow me to be the first to welcome you!
Pay attention, or you'll miss the big reveal!

Where is the laughter? The thunderous applause?
There is simply no pleasing you!

Dance with me! Prance with me! Choose your stage!
A fiery demise or a watery grave!

Shall we begin?
Let dominion of your precious skies be decided here and now!

And thus the Shadow Queen doth fall.
I commend you on your victory.

Yes, such skill and strength are deserving of a more fitting stage.
Come, mortals─the true master of shadows awaiteth you...

Something comes...but it is no voidsent!
Be ready for anything!

Shadow itself shall be mine armor!
Come! Strike your feeble blows in vain!

Such defenses will be difficult to pierce...
But mind not his boasts! A persistent assault will prevail!

Er...I may have misjudged the enemy.
They should've been staining the soles of my boots by now...

What are you fools gawping at!?
Don't just stand there─your captain is in danger!
Hey! You can't just run off!
Deserting a battle is punishable by death!

I order you to stand your ground!
Come back here now! ...Please?

Grrr... Damn it all to the seventh hell!
I'll kill you bastards if it's the last thing I do!
...Y-You haven't seen the last of me! Mark my words! It'll be you who rues this day!!!
I'll stomp these worms into the dust myself! This is my fight, understand? Stay out of it!
Defeat Grynewaht
Defeat imperial forces
Defeat imperial soldiers with the Red Baron
Defeat Grynewaht
For every yapping cur I strike down, another takes his place!
How many soldiers did he bring with him!?
...We will stand against this tide.
Did you hear th─ Whoa! Watch out for that big one!

Ware the colossus!
It means to destroy itself and us along with it!

Hah, you have felled a titan!
But that still only counts as one!

I will handle these soldiers!
Pray dispose of the giant!
Well struck! My thanks, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
The colossi are scrap, and the captain hits us as often as the enemy! Enough! Time for a tactical withdrawal!

Initiating final disengagement sequence.
All non-combat personnel are advised to evacuate.
Mine age of slumber is at an end.
A thousand thousand suns may set...
But the insult of mine imprisonment...
Hath been etched upon mine eternal memory.
I am come to mete out justice.
To bestow the blessings of victory unending.
I am Zurvan.
He who standeth above all other gods.
He who shall bring slaughter and ruin!

Disengagement sequence complete.
Subject: Zurvan is released from containment.
Good and evil, the war eternal...
The fires of anger roar and howl...
My doubt is fled!
I hunger for conflict!
By sorrow's chill doth all become ice...
I am beyond your petty morality!
Death's gaze is fixed upon you...
I shall rise above all!
Bear witness to my will!

Frozen in time, mine armor of flame.
Unto eternity's end, my righteous reign!
Bow to mine infallible judgment!

What manner of mortals withstand such punishment?
By battle, then, shall your fate be decided!

Stubbornly doth mine enemy cling to life...
But soon shall I loosen that hold!

Graven in flesh, the brand is awoken...
Suffer in endless torment!
Hath mine equivocation cost me this contest!?
If such is my fate...
Limit Break
Arrive at the Wound
Defeat the Leightonward
Arrive in the Fever
Defeat Gowrow
Clear the Heart
Arrive at Spae Rock
Defeat Lugat
Arrive at the Warden's Delight
Defeat the Governor
Arrive at Glowering Krautz
Ugh... Naught for it but to fight!
More of them? Confound it!
Let me at 'em!
Heh heh heh... I've been waiting for you...
Ramble... Ramble... Ramble with me all through the night...
Down... Down... Down into the depths and to your death...
So spirited... But if you will not serve, then you will suffer...
Island, dead ahead! All hands, brace for impact!

We appear to have arrived at our destination...
Care to go and greet our hosts, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>?
They're on the deck! To arms, to arms!
Watch out, there's more of them!
Island, dead ahead! All hands, brace for impact!
Seems we've arrived... Go on and greet our hosts─the rest of us will patch up the ship!
Clear Rhalgr's Shoulder
Defeat the coeurls
Arrive at Harmony
Defeat Arbuda
Clear the Closed Fist
One legendary monk trained by fighting coeurls.
Another coeurl! It seems rather angry, doesn't it?
Did you know Ivon Coeurlfist used a pair of Sphairai crafted fists shaped like coeurls?
The monks used that golem to test their speed. It is called “Arbuda.”
I'll time how long each trial takes you, comparing your performance with that of previous monks.
The records suggest you would have made a poor monk...
Your performance still leaves something to be desired.
Look at that! Your time was perfectly average.
That was actually...rather good.
Impressive indeed!
Only Coeurlfist himself has matched the time you just registered...
No monk has done this well before...

A new challenger? Very well.
Ready your fists!

You are quite the fighter.
Let us see if you can handle this!
The time has come to open all my chakra!
Taste the power of the coeurl!
You will not survive this!
I have never met one so strong as you.
A stronger warrior I have not seen!
Arrive at Bardam's Hunt
Defeat Garula
Arrive at the Rebirth of Bardam the Brave
Defeat Bardam
Arrive in the Voiceless Muse
Yea, you who would walk after Bardam! He who was strong as the earth, swift as a horse, brave as the thunder!

You who would become Warriors of the Steppe!
With death will you dance!
The first trial is upon you...
Be not deceived by demons...
The second trial is upon you...
Be not tempted to rest, but fly across the Steppe as the wind...
The third trial is upon you... Be not afraid of falling stars...

汝、第三ノ、試練ヲ受ケヨ……！
天ヨリ降ル、星ノ欠片ニ耐エテミセヨ……！

Two failures are yours to bear... All will be held to account...
All will know the end...

三度ノ失敗……罰ヲ与エル……
罰デ済ムハ……アト二回……。

三度ノ失敗……罰ヲ与エル……
罰デ済ムハ……アト一回……。
Thus spoke Nhaama: “Hunters in whose veins flows moonlight, show me your mettle!”
Pass, blood of my blood, for you are of the Dusk and of the Steppe.
Thus spoke Azim: “Warriors in whose veins flows sunlight, show me your mettle!”
Pass, blood of my blood, for you are of the Dawn and of the Steppe.
Two failures are yours to bear... You will know failure...
Yea, you worthy successors of Bardam! Yours is the Steppe and everything in it!
Defeat the imperial soldiers
Use the smoke bombs to escape the Sekiseigumi
Head for the Ruby Bazaar
Follow the curious Kojin
Disappointing, but not surprising. In retrospect, we probably should have─
Quiet, Brother! Fight now, talk after!
I'll hold on to Gyodo! You deal with the imperials!
You there! Lay down your arms and surrender at once!

Dammit, they've found us!
Use a smoke bomb so we can escape!

\\<huff> \\<puff> That was close.
Now, which way to the Ruby Bazaar...?

Oh bugger─they've got a whole squadron out front!
What do we do now, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>?
Come with me. I will guide you to your friends.

First a talking fish, and now a tortoise? \\<sigh>
What have we got to lose?
Forgive me...
This...cannot be...
Oh <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>... I don't think we can talk our way out of this one...

Thank the Twelve you made it!
I feared our Kojin friend might not find you in time.
Everything is going to be all right. Trust me...
What are you doing!? Alphinaud said no fighting!
You're going to get us into trouble if you keep this up...

The streets are crawling with Sekiseigumi...
Keep those smoke bombs ready.
Nice work! Now, let's find a way out of here...
Split up and head for the Ruby Bazaar! And remember: under no circumstances must you engage the Sekiseigumi!
Clear the Sogyoku Piscary
Defeat Amikiri
Clear the Kogyoku Palace
Defeat the Ruby Princess
Clear the Shisui Temple
Loose your arrows and draw your swords! Slay the intruders!
Archers, fall back and defend Her Highness!
I must protect...my seas...my people...
Your life─it is mine!
AAAAAAAAARGH! I... I...was so close...
Insolence...such insolence will not be tolerated! You shall take a knee in my sanctuary!
Mists, come to me! Give unto me your power!
Fogs─smother all who stand in my way! Fill them with fear...with despair!
Dark currents from beyond─hearken unto your master! Wash away any who dare oppose me!
AAARGH! So this is the end... The girl...I nearly had her...
予選を勝ち抜け！
Defeat Bartholomew
Defeat the Bronze Bull
Defeat Handeloup
It begins! In the first match of the Thal Group, Bartholomew takes on <String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>!
Combatants, ready your arms!
No holding back, my friend!
And the winner is <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
For the pride of the Sultansworn!
How about this!?
In the next match, <String>ObjectParameter(1)</String> and the Bronze Bull will fight for a place in the Thal group final!
Combatants, take your place!
You'd do well not to underestimate me.
And <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> stops the Bronze Bull's furious charge!
Time for the technique I created to quench the Hellfire Phoenix!
And now, for the final match of the Thal group: Handeloup versus <String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>!
Let us see who will have the honor of fighting in the Ul Cup final!
Come, my friend. Let us fight with all our strength, in the sight of the Fury!
And <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> defeats Handeloup to claim victory in the Thal group!
I shall show you a technique forged in blood and ice.
I am the sword and shield that defends Ishgard. Bear witness to my resolve!
O Halone, grant me strength!
That my most potent attack should be thwarted... But the match isn't over yet!
Triumph in the Ul Cup final
With the blessing of Nald'thal, two mighty warriors now meet in the Ul Cup final!
Come, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Show me what you can do!
And the champion of the Ul Cup─the greatest swordsman in the realm─is <String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>!
Let's see if you can dodge my specialty!
Here's something new to knock you off your feet!
Stay put for me, will you?
Storms of Thanalan, devour all before you!
I'll be damned, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, you're even stronger than the rumors had me believe.
But remember, this is the Sword of Nald you're facing. Let's see if you can outlast me!
Race to the ovoo
Claim the ovoo for the Mol
Defeat the imperial forces
The ovoo lies to the south! I will lead the way!
Warriors of the Mol! You will go no further!
That didn't take long. Weapons!
My thanks, Gosetsu! Forward, brothers and sisters!
The fighting is most fierce! No matter─charge!
I will deal with this rabble, my lord! Make for the ovoo!
They falter! Now, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>─claim the ovoo!
What folly is this? Who dares to challenge the Sun?
The most radiant brother has arrived! A pity...
Rise, brothers of the Sun!
An opening! Defend me, my friends!
Know your place!

The battle has only begun, child!
You will not deprive me of my pleasure!
Hearken to the chaos, brothers!
Lo, the mad udgan comes!
Still alive, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Good! If we want to claim the ovoo, we'll need to deal with those two first!
In death do our souls sing!
I don't like the looks of those giant stone thingies!
Hmph. How dare you...
Well done, well done! Victory is within our reach!
The ovoo, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Claim it! Claim it now!
Defend the ovoo! Let none pass!
The ovoo is ours! The Steppe belongs to the Dotharl!
Bow low, Xaela─you stand before a khagan crowned!
Drive the ironmen from our lands! The khagan wills it!
Such fortuitous timing you have to face a Steppe united!
Let naught be left in our wake!

I don't like the looks of those giant stone thingies!
Get rid of them─now!
Aid the khatun! She must finish her spell!
Bugger, bugger, bugger!
Bwahahaha! You'll have to do better than that!
Bah! I cannot stand that shambling brute.
We have only begun to fight!
But I had you, I had you!
Oh, if I must... The Sun claims these ironmen!
Now this is more like it! All the imperials I can punch!
That's the spirit! Let's not let her put us to shame!
Never did the thought cross my mind, my lord!
Hold fast, warriors of the Steppe! We can defeat them!
There it is! The ovoo! We are not too late!
